text: Alloh taolo Ka'ʙai Bajt-ul-haromro vasilae ʙaroi ustuvori [va somon ʙaxsidan ʙa kori] mardum qaror dod va [hamcunin, hurmati cangu dargiri dar] mohi harom va [kustani] qurʙoni [-i ʙenison] va qurʙonii qalodador [-ro ʙaroi osoisi mardum vaz' kard]. In [guna ahkom] ʙaroi on ast, ki ʙidoned Alloh taolo on ciro, ki dar osmonho va zamin ast medonad va in ki Alloh taolo ʙa har cize donost
